location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham, Council at Bussora (Basra) from John Beaumont at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged and has a hole in the text.

mods.abstract: Letter discusses administrative and financial matters and notes that a packet has been sent to Mirza Jaffier. Beaumont comments he is pleased to hear that the phirmaund [firman] from the Vakeel [Karim Khan] has been obeyed in Bussora [Basra].
